sentences.english: If it could gain one more electron, then chlorine would be iso-electronic with argon.
sentences.chinese: 如果它能得到另一個電子，它就能和氬一樣是電絕緣。

sentences.english: What is the impact if we take more crude argon flow?
sentences.chinese: 如果我們採用更多的原氬流，結果會怎樣。

sentences.english: Helium and argon are monatomic gases.
sentences.chinese: 氦和氬都是單原子氣體。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of Argon laser in the treatment of retinal hole.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價氬激光在治療視網膜裂孔中的應用效果。

sentences.english: After treatment of argon-helium knife, tumor was shrunken to 5cm.
sentences.chinese: 經過氬氦刀治療以後，腫瘤只剩下5公分。

sentences.english: Helium gas was the thermometric fluid.
sentences.chinese: 氦和氬都是單原子氣體。

sentences.english: The purity of argon was analyzed by gas chromatography with argon discharge detector.
sentences.chinese: 採用氬放電檢測器氣相色譜儀分析了氬氣純度。

sentences.english: The argon typically acts as a "shroud" gas to provide protection to the tuyere.
sentences.chinese: 氬主要作爲覆蓋氣體對鼓風口提供保護。

sentences.english: Even if use argon and other gas mixture of cutting will also have a viscous slag tendency.
sentences.chinese: 即使使用氬和其它氣體的混合氣切割也會有粘渣傾向。

sentences.english: Conclusions Argon-Helium cryosurgical treatment is an effective way for cancer with little wound.
sentences.chinese: 結論氬氦刀治療腫瘤療效確切，手術創傷小。

sentences.english: Purified argon is stored as a liquid in storage tanks at the site.
sentences.chinese: 淨化的氬以液態形式儲存在現場的儲存罐。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse and summarize the efficacy of argon green laser photocoagulation on macular hole.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析總結氬離子激光治療黃斑裂孔的療效。

sentences.english: Underpure argon the transformation temperature is higher than under pure hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在純氬中這一轉變溫度要比在純氫中高。

sentences.english: Welding of all sorts of stainless steel joints, kettle bottoms and flanges.
sentences.chinese: 對保溫壺外膽與排水底氬弧環縫焊接。

sentences.english: The argon-rich waste stream from the low pressure column is sent to an argon distillation column.
sentences.chinese: 從低壓塔流出的富氬廢物被送到氬分裂蒸餾塔。

definition: a headstall, ornament on a bridle
